page.title: 18Tourism in Malhamdale
page.content:
The block is in a popular tourist area.To attract visitors ,the block itself possesses a 15th century church and an abundance of the idyllic scenery common to this area. There are several holiday cottages in the area ,such as at Scalegill Mill. Bed and breakfast establishments are also fairly widespread,and the Victoria Hotel in Kirkby Malham also takes in residents.
Transport in Malhamdale The roads in the area are very narrow and are usually contained by dry stone walls.There is a poor bus service. There are no trains,and the River Aire is not navigable at this point.
